sen.j: 片岡 秀太郎（かたおか ひでたろう）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: Hidetaro KATAOKA is a myoseki (professional name) of kabuki actor.
Hidetaro KATAOKA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor.
Hidetaro KATAOKA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor.
Its yago (stage family name) is Matsushimaya.
The stage family name is Matsushimaya.
The stage family name is Matsushimaya.
Current Hidetaro KATAOKA is the second.
Current Hidetaro KATAOKA is the second.
Current Hidetaro KATAOKA is the second.

sen.j: 定紋は七ツ割丸に二引。
sen.e: Its jomon (family crest) is Nanatsuwarimaru ni nihiki.
The Jomon (family crest) is Nanatsu-wari Maru ni Ni-hiki (literally, seven percents with two lines and a circle).
The Jomon (family crest) is Nanatsu-wari Maru ni Ni-hiki (literally, seven percents with two lines and a circle).

tit.j: 初 代 片岡秀太郎
tit.cmt: 原文には 「片岡仁左衛門 (11代目)」とありましたが、リンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「初 代 片岡秀太郎」となっており、本来はこちらの用語を使用していると思われますので、こちらを訳出し、原文修正しました。

sen.j: のちの片岡仁左衛門 (11代目)。
片岡仁左衛門 (13代目)の次男。
sen.e: He is the second son of Nizaemon KATAOKA (the 13th).
He is the second son of Nizaemon KATAOKA (the 13th).
He is the second son of Nizaemon KATAOKA (the 13th).
